|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5022T;SiGe, 5022T, <...>;2; |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/26/2014 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 989898877362 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIA8UD38E3211 |asin = B00MX57AO4 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "AWUS036AC-V020" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *[[ALFA Network AWUS036AC]] • [http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=137&ps=208 AWUS036AC PPage] :802.11ac AC1200 USB 3.0 Wireless Adapter with External Antenna :USB 3.0 Male A , USB ID: 0bda:8812 , FCC ID [https://fcc.io/2AB87/8812 2AB878812] *[[ALFA Network AWUS036ACH]] • [http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=137&ps=225 AWUS036ACH PPage] :AC1200 Wide Range USB 3.0 Wireless Adapter with External Antenna :USB 3.0 Female Micro-B , USB ID: 0bda:8812 , FCC ID ??? :[https://sites.google.com/site/pagecheztom/alfa-awus036ach/ ''Picture of AWUS036ACH v020 circuit board''] an other informations :[http://www.comfast.cn/upload/%E8%BD%AF%E4%BB%B6%E9%A9%B1%E5%8A%A8/%E7%BD%91%E5%8D%A1%E7%B1%BB/8812AU%20912%E3%80%817500AC/linux/RTL8812AU_linux_v4.3.8_12175.20140902.zip ''Tested driver for kernel < 4.x.x. until now''] :[http://de.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/r/rtl8812au/ ''Tested driver for kernel => 4.x.x until now''] *[[ALFA Network AWUS036EAC]] • [http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=137&ps=219 AWUS036EAC PPage] :802.11ac AC1200 Dual-Band USB 3.0 Adapter :USB 3.0 Male A , USB ID: 0bda:8812 , FCC ID ??? See also [[ALFA Network AWUS036 series]].. ==Notes== ===Linux driver=== *There is a linux driver available directly from ALFA's own :[http://www.alfa.com.tw/download_show.php?combo_0=11 ''Downloads page''] which was last updated on 5/7/2015. *[http://wenku.baidu.com/view/733fb49602020740be1e9bb0.html ''RTL8812AU Datasheet''] *[https://github.com/lwfinger/rtlwifi_new/issues/9 On '''lwfinger/rtlwifi_new''']
